title: Want to direct Kamal Haasan with five lip-lock scenes: Adhik
text:
Director Adhik Ravichandran of Trisha Illana Nayanthara fame, recently met with Kamal Haasan. We hear that Adhik was trying to reach Kamal for quite some time in order to narrate a script. Now, we learn from reliable sources that he finally got the opportunity to meet Ulaganayagan.
A source in the know says, "Adhik met Kamal and has managed to narrate to him, a oneliner of the script that he had in mind for the actor. Apparently Kamal too, liked it." When Times of India contacted Adhik to confirm the news, he said, "I want to make a romantic film with Kamal sir with five lip-lock scenes in it. This has been my dream ever since I decided that I wanted to make films. Yes, I met him, but I cannot divulge details on what transpired during the meeting just yet."
